snippet.title: Tux and Fanny - video game trailer
snippet.description:
Here is the trailer for the Tux and Fanny video game.

The game is a prequel to the film and is available on: 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2094730/Tux_and_Fanny/ 
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP7974-CUSA35938_00-8463792798482381
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/tux_and_fanny
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/tux-and-fanny-switch/
X-Box: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/tux-and-fanny/9nfxbw6g25c6
Itch.io: https://meansinteractive.itch.io/tux-and-fanny

If you like TUX AND FANNY, you might enjoy my most recent film, STRAWBERRY MANSION, that I made with Kentucker Audley. https://abirney.com/Strawberry-Mansion

Thanks for stopping by ✌
